title: Heart of Stone
description: The shapeshifting giant Ketzkahtel has been imprisoned for millenia in a tomb beneath the ocean, defeated by the humans who's hearts he devoured by the thousands...Mark Kenslir has served his country for more than fifty years, cursed to never die, to never age, to never change. He now leads a squad of living stone soldiers tasked with defending America from the supernatural...Josie Winters is a typical American girl, raised by a widowed mother and ready to begin a new life at college. The paths of these three very different individuals are about cross as the shapeshifter is set loose in the modern world and sets out to kill again.(Series renamed Stone Soldiers in 2013, new edition released as Mythical- Stone Soldiers #1)
author: C.E. Martin
